Grace St., 2210 tmcmulle@vcu.edu 804.828.1819 B.Sc.  Queen's University (Chemistry)  1964 Ph.D.  Queen's University (Experimental Physical Chemistry)  1968 Postdoctoral:  University of Bristol  (Theoretical Condensed Matter Physics) 1968-70 McMaster University (Theoretical Condensed Matter Physics)  1970-71 Positions Held: Instructor, Dept of Physics, Virginia Commonwealth University  2008-Present Affiliate Associate Professor, Dept. of Physics, Virginia Commonwealth University  1996-2008 Associate Professor, Dept. of Physics, Virginia Commonwealth University  1988-1996 Associate Professor (visiting), Dept. of Physics, University of Toronto, 1987-1988 Research Scientist, Dept. of Physics, Queens University 1983-1987 Associate Professor, Dept. of Physics, Memorial University of Newfoundland  1981-1983 Assistant Professor/Research Associate, Dept. of Physics, Queen's University  1975-1981 Assistant Professor, Dept. of Chemistry, St. Francis Xavier University 1971-1975
